description: Vi IMproved - enhanced vi editor - with GNOME2 GUI
details:
Vim is an almost compatible version of the UNIX editor Vi.

 Many new features have been added: multi level undo, syntax
 highlighting, command line history, on-line help, filename
 completion, block operations, folding, Unicode support, etc.

 This package contains a version of vim compiled with a GNOME2 GUI
 and support for scripting with Lua, Perl, Python, Ruby, and Tcl.
 devel::lang:tcl, implemented-in::c, interface::x11, role::program,
 scope::application, suite::gnome, uitoolkit::gtk, uitoolkit::ncurses,
 use::editing, works-with::text, works-with::unicode, x11::application
